name: Miss Marbles
description:
Throw marbles with powers to score points, while destroying your opponents' balls

A Mix of CCG, curling and marbles :p

Context

Made alone for MetaFab Jam.

Features
  • 7-level campaign
  • Compose and arrange your decks
  • 8 differents marbles with special powers
  • You can buy new cards ( Web3 Testnet)
Instructions
  • All the game is played with mouse
  • 2nd Mouse bouton : Move camera
  • F1/F2 : Change camera view
Rules
  • Stop your marble in a green zone to score points
  • Clear the opponent's marbles
  • 8 turns, winner is payer with most points at the end
Marbles Credits

All assets used in this project are freely available and listed here.
